28.eng-name: The Book of Horses, Races and Shooting

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ali bin Abi Talib, may Allah be pleased with him, said:"A mule was given as a gift to the Messenger of Allah and he rode it." 'Ali said: "If we mate a donkey with a horse, we will have one like this." The Messenger of Allah said: "That is only done by those who do not know

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّشْدِيدِ فِي حَمْلِ الْحَمِيرِ عَلَى الْخَيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Stern Warning Against Mating A Donkey With A Horse
